body:
### Describe the bug

i was trying to create a data type that accepts int or float in a function from python, but it doesn't support math operations

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

here's a simple code

```cython

ctypedef fused num_t:
    int
    float

cpdef show(list[num_t] data):
    cdef num_t i
    for i in data:
        print(i + <num_t>1) # Operator "+" not supported for types "num_t" and "num_t" Operator "+" not supported for types "num_t" and "num_t" when expected type is "object"
```

when compilng i get this error
```
Compiling ./mainc.pyx because it changed.
[1/1] Cythonizing ./mainc.pyx

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...

    return total

cpdef show(list[num_t] data):
    cdef num_t i
    for i in data:
             ^
------------------------------------------------------------

mainc.pyx:15:13: Cannot coerce to a type that is not specialized

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
    return total

cpdef show(list[num_t] data):
    cdef num_t i
    for i in data:
        print(i + <num_t>1)                  ^
------------------------------------------------------------

mainc.pyx:16:18: Compiler crash in AnalyseExpressionsTransform

ModuleNode.body = StatListNode(mainc.pyx:2:0)
StatListNode.stats[1] = CFuncDefNode(mainc.pyx:13:0,
    args = [...]/1,
    c_compile_guard = '',
    modifiers = [...]/0,
    outer_attrs = [...]/2,
    overridable = True,
    visibility = 'private')
File 'Nodes.py', line 409, in analyse_expressions: StatListNode(mainc.pyx:14:4)
File 'Nodes.py', line 7692, in analyse_expressions: ForInStatNode(mainc.pyx:15:4)
File 'Nodes.py', line 409, in analyse_expressions: StatListNode(mainc.pyx:16:13)
File 'Nodes.py', line 6100, in analyse_expressions: ExprStatNode(mainc.pyx:16:13)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 628, in analyse_expressions: SimpleCallNode(mainc.pyx:16:13,
    analysed = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 6214, in analyse_types: SimpleCallNode(mainc.pyx:16:13,
    analysed = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 8858, in analyse_types: TupleNode(mainc.pyx:16:13,
    is_sequence_constructor = 1,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 12108, in analyse_types: AddNode(mainc.pyx:16:16,
    infix = True,
    operator = '+',
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 11453, in analyse_types: TypecastNode(mainc.pyx:16:18,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 11530, in calculate_constant_result: TypecastNode(mainc.pyx:16:18,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 11550, in calculate_result_code: TypecastNode(mainc.pyx:16:18,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)

Compiler crash traceback from this point on:
  File "C:\Program Files\Python314\Lib\site-packages\Cython\Compiler\ExprNodes.py", line 11550, in calculate_result_code
    return self.type.cast_code(operand_result)
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "C:\Program Files\Python314\Lib\site-packages\Cython\Compiler\PyrexTypes.py", line 44, in cast_code
    return "((%s)%s)" % (self.empty_declaration_code(), expr_code)
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^
  File "C:\Program Files\Python314\Lib\site-packages\Cython\Compiler\PyrexTypes.py", line 50, in empty_declaration_code
    self._empty_declaration = self.declaration_code('')
                              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^
  File "C:\Program Files\Python314\Lib\site-packages\Cython\Compiler\PyrexTypes.py", line 1952, in declaration_code
    raise Exception("This may never happen, please report a bug")
Exception: This may never happen, please report a bug
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "D:\backup\programming\Python\test\setup.py", line 7, in <module>
    ext_modules=cythonize("./mainc.pyx"),
                ~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "C:\Program Files\Python314\Lib\site-packages\Cython\Build\Dependencies.py", line 1159, in cythonize
    cythonize_one(*args)
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^
  File "C:\Program Files\Python314\Lib\site-packages\Cython\Build\Dependencies.py", line 1303, in cythonize_one
    raise CompileError(None, pyx_file)
Cython.Compiler.Errors.CompileError: ./mainc.pyx
```

### Expected behaviour

```cython
ctypedef fused num_t:
    int
    float

cpdef show(list[num_t] data):
    cdef num_t i
    for i in data:
        print(i + <num_t>1)
```

in python should working good with int or float like this

```python
import mainc

print(mainc.show([1,2.5,3]))
# 2
# 3.5
# 4
```

### OS

windows 10

### Python version

3.14

### Cython version

3.14

### Additional context

_No response_

rename.from: [BUG] ctypedef fused for int an float does not support math operations
rename.to: [BUG] ctypedef fused for int or float does not support math operations
